metadata.name: Make a 9
metadata.description: Use the stack of 3s to create 9 (3+3+3), then drop it on the drop zone.

widgets.label: I need a 9. Please drop it here.
widgets.on_success_message: Congratulations! You completed all three puzzles!

notes:
Puzzle 3: Make a 9

Goal: Create the number 9 using only 3s and drop it on the blue drop zone.

Hint: The 3 is a 'copy source' - when you drag from it, you get a copy and the original stays. Drag three 3s out and add them together: 3 + 3 = 6, then 6 + 3 = 9.
